1.03.name: wordpress/comment-author-checklist
1.03.description:
This new template tag generates a list of registered users. The post author and users who have commented on the post are crossed off the list; any users who have not yet commented are left alone.

Options:

  • exclude the admin user
  • choose the minimum user role to be show in the list (e.g. Contributor, Author, etc.)
  • sort the list by user ID, display name, first name, last name, or login
  • choose the categories in which to show the list

This plugin requires PHP 5.10.
